thread.title: Looney's Pub in Canton reopens after health department closure
thread.title_full: Looney's Pub in Canton reopens after health department closure

author: Sarah Meehan
title: Looney's Pub in Canton reopens after health department closure
text:
Looney's Pub in Canton reopens after health department closure Looney's Canton Algerina Perna 
Looney's Pub in Canton reopened Thursday afternoon after it was temporarily closed by the health department. 
Looney's Pub in Canton reopened Thursday afternoon after it was temporarily closed by the health department. (Algerina Perna) Caption Dinner and a movie at CineBistro 
CineBistro is a luxury movie-and-meal theater. (Lloyd Fox, Baltimore Sun video) 
CineBistro is a luxury movie-and-meal theater. (Lloyd Fox, Baltimore Sun video) Caption Center Stage ready to reopen 
Baltimore Center Stage is set to reopen after a year of major renovations with the production of "The White Snake." (Lloyd Fox, Baltimore Sun video) 
Baltimore Center Stage is set to reopen after a year of major renovations with the production of "The White Snake." (Lloyd Fox, Baltimore Sun video)
